Name: FIRE AXE
Description: The perfect tool for getting up close and personal with devastating impact.
FlavourText: What a way to make an entrance!

Name: MATCHES
Description: 'Wood
FlavourText: phosphorus and a frictional surface combine to quickly reproduce one of mankind''s greatest achievements over and over again.'

Name: GLOCK 18C
Description: 'A reliable handgun popular with law enforcement and military elite. Boasting a full auto mode that fires 1
FlavourText: 200 rounds per minute. This pistol is non-negotiable 9 mm authority.'
DropChance: Is that a machine pistol in your pocket?

Name: FIRST AID KIT
Description: Kit of preparedness to treat most common ailments and wounds.
FlavourText: Medic!

Name: S&W .44 SNUB NOSE
Description: 'A classic revolver that gained its reputation due to its precision and power. It hardly ever misfires
FlavourText: and can quickly be concealed in a pocket or waistband.'

Name: KALASHNIKOV AK-47 (7.62mm)
Description: 'Instantly recognized by its wooden stock and banana shaped magazine
FlavourText: this simple yet dependable weapon is the archetypal rifle of insurgents
Additional Info: Start your own reign of terror.

Name: MEDICINAL CHARCOAL
Description: Mainly used for purification and highly recommended to treat poisoning and overdoses. The microporosity of the material is unsurpassed in terms of absorption.
FlavourText: Good for what ails you.

Name: ARMY BOOTS
Description: 'Military style boots honed for foot protection. Perfect for a variety of climates. They may seem clumsy
FlavourText: but the sore truth is that they always come out on top.'
DropChance: These boots are made for walking.

Name: BACKPACK
Description: Modern man found ergonomic ways to store items. These carry their weight in gold.
FlavourText: Carry more with less effort.

Name: RED LEATHER JACKET
Description: 'Candy apple red might not be the best camo
FlavourText: but you''ll thrill them as you kill them.'

Name: SKI HELMET
Description: 'Some helmets makes you look good
FlavourText: others make you look like a fool. This is the pretty non-bulletproof version.'

Name: COMBAT KNIFE
Description: 'Rumor has it that really good steel comes from Sweden. Well honed
FlavourText: this knife will cut through just about anything.'

Name: SMALL BOX OF AMMO
Description: 'Manufactured precision-made ammunition
FlavourText: stable and able. The best choice for your weapons.'

Name: SHOULDER ARMOR
Description: Both protection and enhancement in one. Makes you look beefed up and adds good protection against any blunt violence.
FlavourText: The slender becomes the wider.

Name: LIFE JACKET
Description: 'Designed to hold a man''s head above water and signal attention with bright color. These well-crafted padded jackets can withstand a punch or two. Keeps you bobbing up most unexpectedly.'
FlavourText: 'Low profile ain''t your thing.'

Name: GAS CAN
Description: 'Key ingredient for most motorized vehicles
FlavourText: highly flammable and invaluable in the production of improvised incendiary weapons.'
DropChance: 'Alluring fumes that''ll go to your head.'

Name: SPRAY CANS
Description: Color the world around you or inhale it to see perhaps even greater colors. Unknown duration.
FlavourText: Put some more color into this world.

Name: SHOVEL
Description: 'A basic tool refined with enhanced functionality. Can provide shelter
FlavourText: food

Name: DYNAMITE
Description: 'Well rolled rods that
FlavourText: despite their size
Weight: Each additional stick adds +1 damage and +1" to radius.

Name: SMALL STASH
Description: 'The alluring glow to the little pile of valuables gives you a happy feeling. Someone’s been collecting. Now
FlavourText: it’s yours to cash in.'

Name: HARPOON GUN
Description: Quieter than most projectile weapons and more powerful than a sling shot. Works on land and in water. These are rarely found unmodified.
FlavourText: 'Not just for for whaling

Name: FLASHLIGHT
Description: 'Packed with electrical lighting power to cut bright cones through darkness
FlavourText: shake or smack if not working properly.'

Name: WRENCH
Description: A real nut buster! The last tool a real mechanic would ever heft but still more flexible than everything else in the tool box. Loosen or tighten up - all in one.
FlavourText: 'Sweat or blood
DropChance: a tool fit for both trades.'

Name: METALLIC LIGHTER
Description: 'A fistful of torch. This small item is a true art of engineering
FlavourText: that can fire up under the most dire circumstances.'

Name: CHAINSAW
Description: 'Gasoline and electric versions exist. Both are very dangerous
FlavourText: but the roar of the gasoline version far outweighs the other in terms of intimidation.'
Additional Info: A natural 1 on the Fighting die (regardless of the Wild Die) hits the user instead.

Name: REMINGTON 870
Description: A trusted pump-action shotgun issued in many variations. Owning one of these will change your life by ending others.
FlavourText: Pack a punch.

Name: BINOCULARS
Description: Good for spying from great distances. Some models feature zoom lenses or other extras.
FlavourText: 'Just what you''re looking for...'

Name: U-LOCK
Description: 'Always make sure you secure your ride
FlavourText: prisoner or box of supplies thoroughly.'

Name: TOBACCO
Description: For those special moments of personal reflection before or after the slaughter.
FlavourText: There are faster ways than this.

Name: ROPE
Description: 'High-quality fabric made to withstand stress and heavy loads. A hiker''s item of choice.'
FlavourText: How long is a piece of rope? Now you know.

Name: RUNNING SHOES
Description: 'Made in faraway lands
FlavourText: by the best of hands. Soft rubber soles
DropChance: and sturdy leather protection. A perfect fit for healthy feet. You´ll never want to run out of these.'

Name: FRUIT PLANT
Description: 'Requires sun
FlavourText: moisture and human-friendly temperatures for the seeds to grow and bear fruit. Treat it with love. This is one of the few things in this world that actually gives something in return.'

Name: M1 COMBAT HELMET
Description: Might just let you live to declare "That was a close call!".
FlavourText: Let me see your war face!

Name: SLEEPING BAG
Description: Crafted from lightweight fabrics. Designed to withstand Mother Nature’s shifting temperament. A vital piece of equipment that is highly sought after.
FlavourText: 'When it''s cold outside and you want to sleep in.'

Name: DUCT TAPE
Description: Highly reliable tech that grapples through stickiness. Can fix most damaged materials and keep it functioning - good enough.
FlavourText: 'If a strip of this doesn''t fix it

Name: REARVIEW MIRROR
Description: A fine polished reflective glass is a true multipurpose tool for survivors of all Eras.
FlavourText: Objects may appear closer than they are.

Name: COMPASS
Description: A precision instrument for safe guidance if you know how to use it.
FlavourText: A force unknown controls this device.

Name: KNEEPADS
Description: 'When you have to quickly take a knee for that critical shot
FlavourText: a little bit of padding can help you keep your focus on target.'
DropChance: Down on your knees and feel good about it.

Name: WELDING HELMET
Description: 'Block body fluids or splinters
FlavourText: hot or cold stuff. Features a tough visor that''s easy to clean.'
DropChance: Protects your face from ugly marks.

Name: RING OF KEYS
Description: People usually keep their valuables locked away. Keys fit into locks. Now just find the matching pairs.
FlavourText: These might be the keys to Another World.

Name: PLASTIC BOTTLES
Description: 'Durable
FlavourText: flexible container that holds liquids for survival or attack. They come in a variety of configurations.'
DropChance: More common than fish in the sea.

Name: GAS MASK
Description: 'Engineering at its best. It''s made for hazardous environments where respiratory functions would be seriously damaged without filtration.'
FlavourText: Smell you later.

Name: PILLBOX
Description: 'Created to alter the biological or mental state of the user. They can stop bleeding
FlavourText: treat insanity
DropChance: induce hallucinations or put men to sleep. Most often they are taken orally

Name: CANNED FOOD
Description: 'Thin metal container that preserves edibles. Often stacked as a status symbol in special cabinets
FlavourText: they usually contain vegetables or meat. Special tools may be used to open them efficiently.'

Name: FINE HARDBOUND BOOK
Description: Intellectual property should not to be underestimated. With a book in your hand you might come out as a pundit instead of a bandit.
FlavourText: Someone had a lot to say.

Name: THICK BLANKET
Description: 'When the nights and the seasons are against you
FlavourText: hug this one a little tighter.'

Name: SCOTCH
Description: 'Comes in many shapes
FlavourText: but once emptied becomes
Effects: Liquid courage in the form of single or blended.

Name: CROWBAR
Description: 'A solid piece of equipment
FlavourText: well worth its weight. Once you start using it

Name: TRENCHCOAT
Description: 'Excellent to conceal contraband on your body
FlavourText: or more mundanely
DropChance: keep your arms and legs dry in harsh weather conditions.'

Name: OIL LAMP
Description: 'The best substitute for a lamp in any low tech society. Any hardcore prepper''s first choice of light source.'
FlavourText: 'Light your way

Name: GLASSES OF SEEING
Description: Glasses come in all forms and shapes but they most often make you look like someone not to hit in the face.
FlavourText: Put these on and a new world might be revealed.

Name: WATER FLASK
Description: 'For longer journeys you always need a reliable container. Never miss a chance to fill ''er up!'
FlavourText: Bring your own drink to the party.

Name: FIRE EXTINGUISHER
Description: Pressure filled canister for dousing flames in awkward places. Can kill a fire in a blink of an eye if handled properly.
FlavourText: Always aim for the base.

Name: ROADSIGN SHIELD
Description: 'A punched lightweight sheet of metal
FlavourText: bendable
DropChance: but sturdy as well. Found everywhere
Additional Info: but one or two in mint condition is a real haul.'
Damage: +1 Parry. +2 Armor to ranged shots that hit.

Name: BB GUN
Description: 'Pneumatic guns are fun to play with
FlavourText: but when you''re facing something bigger than a rat

Name: DRY RATION
Description: Work up some good saliva before you take a bite out of this. The Lembas bread of the future does not come with anything but as a filler of empty stomachs.
FlavourText: It tastes something vague.

Name: FIELD DRESSING
Description: 'Sterile compress
FlavourText: everything you need to stop serious bleeding.'
DropChance: Only break the sealing when you really have to.

Name: FISHING GEAR
Description: 'Getting in tune with nature
FlavourText: biding time in silence in contrast to the actual catching is what it''s all about.'

Name: HOME MADE 22
Description: 'Home made weapons should always be handled with the utmost respect
FlavourText: with the safety always off you don''t want to put this loaded piece down your waistline.'

Name: Hoodie
Description: 'The heavy fabric has a life of its own
FlavourText: made for dousing off some place safe.'

Name: Rusty Kitchen Knife
Description: You most often find useful tools in what used to be called kitchens.
FlavourText: No cutting boards around.

Name: Pocket Knife
Description: 'An ancient pocket knife with wooden handle and carbon steel blade
FlavourText: all you''ll ever need. No?'
DropChance: No excuse for having dirty finger nails.

Name: Toilet rail mace
Description: Most commonly found near senior villages and often the most basic weapon for hooligans.
FlavourText: Made to be held.

Name: Scarf
Description: 'Fashion-statement
FlavourText: political identification
Additional Info: broad piece of fabric has many uses...'
Weight: A garment without a uniform meaning.

Name: Slingshot
Description: 'Silent
FlavourText: cheap and effective all in one
DropChance: never leave you crib without it.'
Effects: Suddenly the ground is littered with ammunition.

Name: Snare Trap
Description: 'Look at the patterns
FlavourText: use bait and lure the little ones into it. Not for anything bigger than rabbits.'

Name: Sweat Pants
Description: Feel every bit as cozy and free wearing these. Not very tough but more comfy than any leg wear out there.
FlavourText: A constant reminder to relax.

Name: T-shirt
Description: 'In the old world there seems to have been many tribes
FlavourText: all with different'
DropChance: The meaning of the print is long forgotten.

Name: Cans of Water
Description: Emergency water with some extra iron to it. Do not shake. A recommendation would be to poor this one like a good ale and let it rest for a good while.
FlavourText: 'It''s never enough.'

Name: Wind Jacket
Description: 'It''s like wearing nothing with holes in it. Once
FlavourText: (when without holes) this must have been something extra special.'
DropChance: At the right angle this one still works.

Name: Worn Boots
Description: 'If you run out of ammo just throw these at the enemy
FlavourText: the stench might catch them off guard.'

Name: Worn Trousers
Description: 'It''s hard to tell what kind of material these are made out of
FlavourText: but as you stretch you can tell they''re not made for any tip-tap shit.'
